chapters.name: Early Stages
chapters.description: Events that happen in the early stages of a business.

chapters.name: Corruption
chapters.description: Some form of corruption happens amongst people in the company.

chapters.name: Audit
chapters.description: Audits are conducted to ensure that financial statements are in accordance with regulations.

chapters.name: Criminal Investigation
chapters.description: Financial records could not be validated so a criminal investigation is opened.

chapters.name: Market Shift
chapters.description: The market undergoes changes, so the business suffers economically.

chapters.name: Restructure
chapters.description: The company restructures to avoid bankruptcy.

chapters.name: Mergers and Acquisitions
chapters.description: The company participates in mergers and acquisitions.

chapters.name: Reorganization
chapters.description: Legal process after M&A or filling bankruptcy.

chapters.name: Antitrust Investigation
chapters.description: The business gets investigated by the government as it is suspected of monopoly.
